scripts.setup-backend: cd backend && gem install bundler --conservative && bundle install && rake db:create db:migrate db:seed
scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn run setup-backend && yarn run setup-frontend
scripts.build: yarn run setup && yarn run build-frontend
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "node setupProxy.js" "yarn run backend" "yarn run frontend"
scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "node setupProxy.js" "yarn run backend" "yarn run serve-frontend"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: yarn install && yarn run setup-frontend && yarn run build-frontend
scripts.heroku-serve: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "node setupProxy.js" "yarn run heroku-backend" "yarn run serve-frontend"
